title: Photos: Twinkle Khanna & Sussanne Khan Party With Their Girl Gang! | MissMalini
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 21 . 2017 
Twinkle Khanna , Susanne Roshan and Farah Khan Ali are the best of friends. Theyâ€™ve stood by each other through thick and thin, and often let their hair down together . Farah shared these fun photos of them partying with their girl gang. Take a look. A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:46pm PST A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:50pm PST A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:53pm PST A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:47pm PST A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:46pm PST A post shared by Farah Khan (@farahkhanali) on Feb 19, 2017 at 7:46pm PST 
How beautiful are all these ladies! Not to forget, this looks like so much fun too! 0
